amendment.description: To reduce aggregate beneficiary obligations by $2,400,000,000 per year beginning in 2009.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1103 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 59. Record Vote Number: 254.

action.text: Amendment SA 1103 proposed by Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S8625-8630, S8637; text: CR S8625) To reduce aggregate beneficiary obligations by $2,400,000,000 per year beginning in 2009.
